New issue

Pre-fetch people's issues while they are authenticating with GitHub #51

Open
nelsonic opened this Issue Jul 22, 2015 · 3 comments

Labels

enhancement help wanted question

Milestone

  Minimal Usable Pr...

Assignee

besarthoxhaj

3 participants

Owner
nelsonic commented Jul 22, 2015

instead of waiting for people to perform the steps to authorise Tudo (to access their GitHub orgs/issues we could request their GitHub username on the login page and initiate the retrieval of their issues while they are authenticating... That way, by the time they get back to Tudo their issues dashboard is already pre-rendered and loaded! This is a wow-factor people won't be expecting and thus our app immediately delivers on our first promise!

Thoughts?

nelsonic added enhancement help wanted question labels Jul 22, 2015
Owner
iteles commented Jul 22, 2015

I'd love to test this out, this will be an amazing selling point if we can get the performance to work like we expect!

nelsonic self-assigned this Jul 23, 2015
Owner
nelsonic commented Jul 23, 2015

@iteles have you watched the Foundation Episode featuring Kevin Systrom (instagram) ?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nld8B9l1aRE

What were the USPs that contributed to instagram's success (considering how many photo-related-apps were in the app store at the time) ?

cc: @besarthoxhaj

nelsonic removed their assignment Jul 23, 2015
besarthoxhaj was assigned by nelsonic Jul 23, 2015
Collaborator
besarthoxhaj commented Jul 23, 2015

@nelsonic love the idea! Let's do it!

nelsonic referenced this issue in nelsonic/github-scraper Jul 28, 2015
Merged

Revive #4

nelsonic added this to the Minimal Viable Product milestone Jul 31, 2015
iteles changed the title from Pre-fetch people's issues while they are authenticating with GiHub to Pre-fetch people's issues while they are authenticating with GitHub Aug 2, 2015
